metadata.Title: CVE-2018-10103 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
tcpdump before 4.9.3 mishandles the printing of SMB data (issue 1 of 2).

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-10103` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

tcpdump - 4.9.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tcpdump package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.9.3-0ubuntu0.18.04.1').
